meanings.definition: Worn out or exhausted from excessive use or wear.
meanings.sent1: The overworn shoes had holes in the soles.
meanings.sent2: The old rug was overworn and threadbare.
meanings.sent3: The overworn pencil couldn't even draw a straight line.
meanings.sent4: Her overworn patience finally reached its limit.
meanings.sent5: The overworn tires skidded on the wet road.

meanings.definition: Repeated or used too often, becoming cliched or unoriginal.
meanings.sent1: The overworn phrase had lost its impact.
meanings.sent2: The story felt overworn with its predictable ending.
meanings.sent3: His overworn jokes made everyone groan.
meanings.sent4: The melody sounded overworn after being played on repeat.
meanings.sent5: The overworn plot twist was easily guessed by the audience.
